    if (!grepl("/", pkg_string)) install.packages(pkg_string,repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")

    library(lib_str, character.only = TRUE)
  }
}

## Our Case

* Compustat Global data, public firms from 18 Central and Eastern European countries, 2000-2016
* Fama French industry classifiers and four variables
    $$
    \begin{aligned} 
      logat &= log(at) \\
      cfoa &= oancf/lag(at) \\ 
      accoa &= (ib - oancf)/lag(at) \\ 
      iboa &= ib/lag(at) 
    \end{aligned}
    $$
    * at: Total assets (M US-$)
    * oancf: Operating cash flow (M US-$)
    * ib: Income before extraordinary items (M US-$)
* How is profitability distributed and related to countries, industries and size? How are cash flows and accruals related? 
* ExPanD: [https://jgassen.shinyapps.io/ExPanD_amis2018](https://jgassen.shinyapps.io/ExPanD_amis2018)
